flavor_text:
When they vibrate the bumps on their
heads, they can make waves in water
or earthquake-like vibrations on land.

It lives in the water and on land.
It uses its long, sticky tongue
to capture prey.

It lives in the water and on land.
It uses its long, sticky tongue
to immobilize its opponents.
